issue.title: [Python] Consolidate path/filesystem handling in pyarrow.dataset and pyarrow.fs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10644](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10644). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The `pyarrow.dataset` module grew some custom code to deal with paths and filesystems, but also the`pyarrow.fs` package has some general utilities for this.
